# teste

```{r}
library(rvest)
ult <- p(peity::peity(runif(5), "pie")) %>%
  as.character() %>% 
  read_xml()

ult_span <- ult %>% rvest::html_node("span")
ult_script <- ult %>% rvest::html_node("script")
```

isso aconte sempre

vamos`r span("tudo", peity::bar(runif(5)), " oi")`tada

vamos`r span("tudo", peity::bar(runif(5)), " oi") %>% as.character()`tada
